XSelect.XField: cd.id, cd.code, CONCAT(cd.code, '-', IF (cdv.code IS NULL,'',cdv.code)) as code_complete, cdv.code as version_code, cd.name, cd.id_class, cd.description, cd.is_active, cdv.reason as version_reason, cdv.approval_date as version_approval_date, cdt.name as type_name, cdv.template as version_template, f.id as version_file_id, f.guid as version_file_guid, GROUP_CONCAT(c.code SEPARATOR ',') as class_code, GROUP_CONCAT(c.name SEPARATOR ',') as class_name, GROUP_CONCAT(CONCAT(c.code,' - ', c.name) SEPARATOR ',') as class_full_name, ( SELECT IF( COUNT(cdviii.id) = 0, 1, IF (cdviii.is_approved = 0, -1, IF(cdviii.is_approved IS NULL, 0, 1) ) ) FROM fw_rm_controlled_document_version cdviii WHERE cdviii.id IN ( SELECT MAX(cdvii.id) FROM fw_rm_controlled_document_version cdvii INNER JOIN fw_rm_controlled_document cdii ON (cdii.id = cdvii.id_controlled_document) WHERE cdvii.id > cdii.id_current_version AND cdvii.id_controlled_document = cd.id) ) as version_approval_status, ( SELECT count(wfpio.id) FROM fw_wf_process_instance_obs wfpio WHERE wfpio.id_process_instance = cdv.id_wf_instance AND (wfpio.obs_public IS NOT NULL OR wfpio.obs_public <> '') ) as comments_count

XFrom.XTable: fw_rm_controlled_document cd INNER JOIN fw_rm_controlled_document_type cdt ON (cdt.id = cd.id_controlled_document_type) LEFT OUTER JOIN fw_rm_controlled_document_version cdv ON (cdv.id = cd.id_current_version) LEFT OUTER JOIN fw_file f on (f.id = cdv.id_file) #LEFT OUTER JOIN fw_rm_controlled_document_class_template cdct ON (cdct.id_controlled_document = cd.id) LEFT OUTER JOIN fw_rm_class c ON (c.id = cd.id_class)

XWhere.XCondition: AND ( cd.name like '{param->text}' OR cd.description like '{param->text}' OR cdv.reason like '{param->text}' OR cdt.name like '{param->text}' OR cd.code like '{param->text}' OR cd.guid_object like '{param->text}')
